name: RUUUN Until The Teleport
description:
Welcome Everyone! Welcome to my first game jam creation!

I know it still have many jagged edges but criticism are welcome.

Controls:

  • Space - Go left
  • Space - Go Right
  • Space - Teleport left
  • Space - Teleport right

There we go everything is listed.

BTW you teleport the blue cube that is moving diagonally.
